describe: Panama is a country on the isthmus linking Central and South America. It's known for the Panama Canal, a famous feat of human engineering. The country is rich in biodiversity, with rainforests, mountains, and beaches.

cities.name: üåÜ Panama City
cities.geographical_location: Located at the Pacific entrance of the Panama Canal.
cities.climate: Tropical wet and dry climate with a long rainy season.

cities.name: üèù Bocas del Toro
cities.geographical_location: An archipelago in the Caribbean Sea, near the border with Costa Rica.
cities.climate: Tropical rainforest climate with high humidity and rainfall.
cities.famous_cuisine: Patacones, Coconut Rice, and Fresh Seafood.

cities.name: üåÜ David
cities.geographical_location: Located in the western part of Panama, near the border with Costa Rica.
cities.climate: Tropical savanna climate with a distinct dry season.
